# fieldOfViewOrientation

**Instance Property**

The orientation with which the system uses to apply the field-of-view degrees.

## Declaration

```swift
var fieldOfViewOrientation: CameraFieldOfViewOrientation
```

## Discussion

The value of this property determines the orientation that the system uses to apply the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PerspectiveCameraComponent/fieldOfViewInDegrees] value.

This property defaults to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CameraFieldOfViewOrientation/vertical].

## Setting the field of view

- **fieldOfViewInDegrees**: The camera’s total field of view in degrees.
